subject: Television
lead_paragraph: For SportsNet New York, Willie Randolph’s firing was a news crisis, an all-day story, a one-story day and an occasion to use urgent, percussive music as if war had been declared in Midtown.
snippet: For SportsNet New York, Willie Randolph’s firing was a news crisis, an all-day story, a one-story day and an occasion to use urgent, percussive music as if war had been declared in Midtown.
